verses.text: Now \w these|strong="H3881"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5927"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w who|strong="H3548"\w* \w went|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w Zerubbabel|strong="H2216"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Shealtiel|strong="H7597"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w Jeshua|strong="H3442"\w*: Seraiah, Jeremiah, Ezra,
Amariah, Malluch,\f + \fr 12:2 \ft Malluch is a variant of Malluchi; see verse 14.\f* Hattush,
Shecaniah, Rehum,\f + \fr 12:3 \ft Rehum is a variant of Harim; see verse 15, Nehemiah 7:42, and Ezra 2:39.\f* Meremoth,
Iddo, Ginnethon,\f + \fr 12:4 \ft Many Hebrew manuscripts and Vulgate (see also verse 16); most MT manuscripts Ginnethoi\f* Abijah,

Mijamin,\f + \fr 12:5 \ft Mijamin is a variant of Miniamin; see verse 17.\f* Maadiah,\f + \fr 12:5 \ft Maadiah is a variant of Moadiah; see verse 17.\f* Bilgah,\f + \fr 12:5 \ft Bilgah is a variant of Bilgai; also in verse 18; see Nehemiah 10:8.\f*
Shemaiah, Joiarib, Jedaiah,
Sallu, Amok, Hilkiah, and Jedaiah. These were the leaders of the priests and their associates in the days of Jeshua.

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w were|strong="H3881"\w* \w Jeshua|strong="H3442"\w*, \w Binnui|strong="H1131"\w*, \w Kadmiel|strong="H6934"\w*, \w Sherebiah|strong="H8274"\w*, \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w Mattaniah|strong="H4983"\w*, \w who|strong="H1931"\w*, \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* associates, led \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w songs|strong="H1960"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w thanksgiving|strong="H1960"\w*.

\w Bakbukiah|strong="H1229"\w* \w and|strong="H4931"\w* \w Unni|strong="H6042"\w*, \w their|strong="H5048"\w* associates, stood across \w from|strong="H5048"\w* \w them|strong="H5048"\w* \w in|strong="H5048"\w* \w the|strong="H5048"\w* services.
Jeshua was the father of Joiakim, Joiakim was the father of Eliashib, Eliashib was the father of Joiada,
Joiada was the father of Jonathan,\f + \fr 12:11 \ft Jonathan is a variant of Johanan; see verse 22.\f* and Jonathan was the father of Jaddua.

\w In|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w Joiakim|strong="H3113"\w*, \w these|strong="H3117"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w priestly|strong="H3548"\w* families: of the family of Seraiah, Meraiah; of Jeremiah, Hananiah;
of Ezra, Meshullam; of Amariah, Jehohanan;

of Malluchi,\f + \fr 12:14 \ft Malluchi is a variant of Malluch; see verse 2.\f* Jonathan; of Shebaniah,\f + \fr 12:14 \ft Shebaniah is a variant of Shecaniah; see verse 3; see also Syriac and some Hebrew and LXX manuscripts.\f* Joseph;
of Harim, Adna; of Meraioth,\f + \fr 12:15 \ft Meraioth is a variant of Meremoth; see verse 3 and also some LXX manuscripts.\f* Helkai;
of Iddo, Zechariah; of Ginnethon, Meshullam;
of Abijah, Zichri; of Miniamin and of Moadiah,\f + \fr 12:17 \ft Moadiah is a variant of Maadiah; see verse 5.\f* Piltai;
of Bilgah, Shammua; of Shemaiah, Jonathan;
of Joiarib, Mattenai; of Jedaiah, Uzzi;
of Sallai,\f + \fr 12:20 \ft Sallai is a variant of Sallu; see verse 7.\f* Kallai; of Amok, Eber;
of Hilkiah, Hashabiah; and of Jedaiah, Nethanel.

\w In|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* Eliashib, \w Joiada|strong="H3111"\w*, \w Johanan|strong="H3110"\w*,\f + \fr 12:22 \ft Johanan is a variant of Jonathan; see verse 11.\f* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w Jaddua|strong="H3037"\w*, \w during|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w reign|strong="H4438"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w Darius|strong="H1867"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Persian|strong="H6542"\w*, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* families \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w were|strong="H3881"\w* \w recorded|strong="H3789"\w*.

\w As|strong="H5704"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w descendants|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Levi|strong="H3878"\w*, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* family \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* \w up|strong="H5704"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Johanan|strong="H3110"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Eliashib \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w recorded|strong="H3789"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Book|strong="H5612"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Chronicles|strong="H1697"\w*.\f + \fr 12:23 \ft Or the Book of the Annals or the Book of the Historical Events\f*

\w The|strong="H1984"\w* \w leaders|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1984"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w Hashabiah|strong="H2811"\w*, \w Sherebiah|strong="H8274"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jeshua|strong="H3442"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Kadmiel|strong="H6934"\w*,\f + \fr 12:24 \ft Or Sherebiah, Jeshua, Binnui, and Kadmiel\f* \w along|strong="H5980"\w* \w with|strong="H1732"\w* \w their|strong="H5980"\w* associates, \w who|strong="H1121"\w* stood across \w from|strong="H1121"\w* \w them|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w give|strong="H3034"\w* \w praise|strong="H1984"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w thanksgiving|strong="H3034"\w* \w as|strong="H1121"\w* \w one|strong="H1121"\w* section alternated \w with|strong="H1732"\w* \w the|strong="H1984"\w* \w other|strong="H5048"\w*, \w as|strong="H1121"\w* \w prescribed|strong="H4687"\w* \w by|strong="H4687"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w the|strong="H1984"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* God.

\w Mattaniah|strong="H4983"\w*, \w Bakbukiah|strong="H1229"\w*, \w Obadiah|strong="H5662"\w*, \w Meshullam|strong="H4918"\w*, \w Talmon|strong="H2929"\w*, \w and|strong="H8104"\w* \w Akkub|strong="H6126"\w* \w were|strong="H7778"\w* \w gatekeepers|strong="H7778"\w* \w who|strong="H8104"\w* \w guarded|strong="H8104"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* storerooms \w at|strong="H7778"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w gates|strong="H8179"\w*.

\w They|strong="H3117"\w* served \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Joiakim|strong="H3113"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jeshua|strong="H3442"\w*, \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jozadak|strong="H3136"\w*,\f + \fr 12:26 \ft Jozadak is a variant of Jehozadak; see 1 Chronicles 6:14.\f* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Nehemiah|strong="H5166"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w governor|strong="H6346"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Ezra|strong="H5830"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w scribe|strong="H5608"\w*. The Dedication of the Wall

\w At|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w dedication|strong="H2598"\w* \w of|strong="H2346"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w wall|strong="H2346"\w* \w of|strong="H2346"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w were|strong="H3881"\w* \w sought|strong="H1245"\w* \w out|strong="H1245"\w* \w from|strong="H3881"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* homes \w and|strong="H3389"\w* \w brought|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w celebrate|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* joyous \w dedication|strong="H2598"\w* \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w thanksgiving|strong="H8426"\w* \w and|strong="H3389"\w* \w singing|strong="H7892"\w*, accompanied \w by|strong="H3605"\w* \w cymbals|strong="H4700"\w*, \w harps|strong="H3658"\w*, \w and|strong="H3389"\w* \w lyres|strong="H3658"\w*.

\w The|strong="H4480"\w* \w singers|strong="H7891"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w also|strong="H1121"\w* assembled \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w region|strong="H3603"\w* \w around|strong="H5439"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w villages|strong="H2691"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w Netophathites|strong="H5200"\w*,

\w from|strong="H3389"\w* Beth-gilgal, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w from|strong="H3389"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w fields|strong="H7704"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Geba|strong="H1387"\w* \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w Azmaveth|strong="H5820"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w had|strong="H3588"\w* \w built|strong="H1129"\w* \w villages|strong="H2691"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w themselves|strong="H1992"\w* \w around|strong="H5439"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

After \w the|strong="H3548"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w had|strong="H3548"\w* \w purified|strong="H2891"\w* \w themselves|strong="H2891"\w*, \w they|strong="H5971"\w* \w purified|strong="H2891"\w* \w the|strong="H3548"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w the|strong="H3548"\w* \w gates|strong="H8179"\w*, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w the|strong="H3548"\w* \w wall|strong="H2346"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H5975"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w brought|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w leaders|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H8269"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w wall|strong="H2346"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w appointed|strong="H5975"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w thanksgiving|strong="H8426"\w* \w choirs|strong="H8426"\w*. \w One|strong="H8147"\w* \w was|strong="H3063"\w* \w to|strong="H5927"\w* proceed \w along|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w top|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H8269"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w wall|strong="H2346"\w* \f + \fr 12:31 \ft Or alongside the wall; also in verse 38\f* \w to|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w right|strong="H3225"\w*, \w toward|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Dung \w Gate|strong="H8179"\w*.

\w Hoshaiah|strong="H1955"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w half|strong="H2677"\w* \w the|strong="H2677"\w* \w leaders|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H8269"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w followed|strong="H3212"\w*,
along with \w Azariah|strong="H5838"\w*, \w Ezra|strong="H5830"\w*, \w Meshullam|strong="H4918"\w*,
\w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*, \w Shemaiah|strong="H8098"\w*, \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w*,

\w and|strong="H1121"\w* some \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3548"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w with|strong="H3548"\w* \w trumpets|strong="H2689"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w also|strong="H1121"\w* \w Zechariah|strong="H2148"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jonathan|strong="H3129"\w*, \w the|strong="H3548"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Shemaiah|strong="H8098"\w*, \w the|strong="H3548"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Mattaniah|strong="H4983"\w*, \w the|strong="H3548"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Micaiah|strong="H4320"\w*,\f + \fr 12:35 \ft Micaiah is a variant of Mica; see Nehemiah 11:22.\f* \w the|strong="H3548"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Zaccur|strong="H2139"\w*, \w the|strong="H3548"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Asaph,

\w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w his|strong="H1732"\w* associates—\w Shemaiah|strong="H8098"\w*, \w Azarel|strong="H5832"\w*, \w Milalai|strong="H4450"\w*, \w Gilalai|strong="H1562"\w*, \w Maai|strong="H4597"\w*, \w Nethanel|strong="H5417"\w*, \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w Hanani|strong="H2607"\w*—\w with|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w musical|strong="H7892"\w* \w instruments|strong="H3627"\w* prescribed \w by|strong="H6440"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w man|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H3627"\w* God. \w Ezra|strong="H5830"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w scribe|strong="H5608"\w* \w led|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* procession.

\w At|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Fountain|strong="H5869"\w* \w Gate|strong="H8179"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w climbed|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w steps|strong="H4609"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w City|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w ascent|strong="H4608"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w wall|strong="H2346"\w* \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w passed|strong="H4325"\w* \w above|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Water|strong="H4325"\w* \w Gate|strong="H8179"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w east|strong="H4217"\w*.

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w second|strong="H8145"\w* \w thanksgiving|strong="H8426"\w* \w choir|strong="H8426"\w* \w proceeded|strong="H1980"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w left|strong="H1980"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w followed|strong="H1980"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H1980"\w* \w half|strong="H2677"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w along|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w top|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H2346"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w wall|strong="H2346"\w*, past \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Tower|strong="H4026"\w* \w of|strong="H2346"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Ovens|strong="H8574"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Broad|strong="H7342"\w* \w Wall|strong="H2346"\w*,

\w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Gate|strong="H8179"\w* \w of|strong="H8179"\w* Ephraim, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Jeshanah|strong="H3466"\w* \w Gate|strong="H8179"\w*,\f + \fr 12:39 \ft Or the Old City Gate\f* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Fish|strong="H1709"\w* \w Gate|strong="H8179"\w*, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Tower|strong="H4026"\w* \w of|strong="H8179"\w* \w Hananel|strong="H2606"\w*, \w and|strong="H6629"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Tower|strong="H4026"\w* \w of|strong="H8179"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Hundred|strong="H3968"\w*, \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w far|strong="H5704"\w* \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Sheep|strong="H6629"\w* \w Gate|strong="H8179"\w*. \w And|strong="H6629"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w stopped|strong="H5975"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Gate|strong="H8179"\w* \w of|strong="H8179"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Guard|strong="H4307"\w*.

\w The|strong="H5975"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w thanksgiving|strong="H8426"\w* \w choirs|strong="H8426"\w* \w then|strong="H5975"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5975"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* God, \w as|strong="H5461"\w* \w did|strong="H8147"\w* \w I|strong="H1004"\w*, \w along|strong="H5973"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H5975"\w* \w half|strong="H2677"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5975"\w* \w officials|strong="H5461"\w* \w accompanying|strong="H5973"\w* \w me|strong="H5973"\w*,

as well as \w the|strong="H3548"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w with|strong="H3548"\w* \w their|strong="H3548"\w* \w trumpets|strong="H2689"\w*—Eliakim, \w Maaseiah|strong="H4641"\w*, \w Miniamin|strong="H4509"\w*, \w Micaiah|strong="H4320"\w*, Elioenai, \w Zechariah|strong="H2148"\w*, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w Hananiah|strong="H2608"\w*—

\w and|strong="H8085"\w* \w also|strong="H8085"\w* \w Maaseiah|strong="H4641"\w*, \w Shemaiah|strong="H8098"\w*, Eleazar, \w Uzzi|strong="H5813"\w*, \w Jehohanan|strong="H3076"\w*, \w Malchijah|strong="H4441"\w*, \w Elam|strong="H5867"\w*, \w and|strong="H8085"\w* \w Ezer|strong="H5829"\w*. \w Then|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* choirs \w sang|strong="H7891"\w* out under \w the|strong="H8085"\w* direction \w of|strong="H8085"\w* \w Jezrahiah|strong="H3156"\w*.

Provisions for Temple Worship
